title: Furry Role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Kill Haters: On any night in where the previous day you got voted, deal a powerful attack to that target.
Fluff Release: Give any other player powerful defense and cures poison.
Cotton Guard: Give yourself Powerful Defense for the night. (Uses: 1)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Support the Mafia into killing all opposing factions.
